channel.title: Extras on Antoine Germain
channel.description: Recent content in Extras on Antoine Germain

item.title: CV
item.description: The PhD life at CORE, UCLouvain Here is an article written by Paolo Giovanni Piacquadio describing the PhD life at CORE. It was written more than 10 years ago, but it is still very close to today’s business! La vie étudiante à Louvain-la-Neuve Ce podcast, disponible sur Spotify, est une fiction réalisée par Louis Escouflaire qui traite des années étudiantes à Louvain-la-Neuve. A short history of the CORE, UCLouvain Coming soon
